title: Planeta Singli. Osiem historii
overview: Planeta Singli. Osiem historii is a series of eight love stories that tell humorously all the dating sites on the Internet. Each of the episodes portraying the contemporary world of love ups and downs will be shown through the eyes of a different director. The stories are a closed whole, and the characters differ in age, origin and motivation to start searching for love online. In individual stories we will see a galaxy of Polish big and small screen stars. The cast includes, among others Izabela Kuna, Bartłomiej Topa, Piotr Witkowski, Maria Maj, Witold Dębicki, Mateusz Damięcki, Masza Wągrocka, Konrad Eleryk, and Antoni Królikowski.
